information.title: Quick Information
information.subtitle: 24/7 Support
information.scheduleContent:
Metro L1 operates from 5:00 - 22:00 daily with 200 trips/day and 9 train sets.

🕕 Peak hours (6:00-8:00, 11:00-12:00, 15:30-18:00):
• Frequency: 8 minutes/trip
• Train sets: 9 units

🕐 Normal hours:
• Frequency: 12 minutes/trip
• Train sets: 6 units

⏱️ Journey time: 29 minutes (Ben Thanh ↔ Suoi Tien)
📍 Distance: 19.7km through 14 stations
⏳ Station stop time: 30 seconds
information.ticketPriceContent:
Metro L1 fares calculated by travel distance:

🎫 Single tickets: From 7,000đ

🎫 Day ticket: 30,000 VND

💳 Monthly passes:
• Unlimited monthly pass: 300,000đ
• Student monthly pass: 150,000đ

🎯 Payment: QR Code, Bank card
information.freeTicketContent:
Completely free for Metro L1 users:

👥 Policy beneficiaries:
• War veterans
• Disabled veterans and patients
• Severely disabled persons

👶 Children:
• Children under 6 years (with adult)
• Children 6-15 years get 50% discount

📋 Requirements:
• Present valid identification documents
• Register discount card at Metro stations
information.luggageContent:
Metro L1 luggage regulations:

✅ Allowed:
• Personal bags, regular backpacks
• Wheeled luggage: ≤ 158cm (length + width + height)
• Weight: ≤ 25kg/person
• Baby strollers (foldable)

❌ Not allowed:
• Luggage with strong, toxic odor
• Live animals (except guide dogs)
• Flammable, explosive liquids
• Weapons, support tools

📏 Maximum dimensions per side: 100cm x 60cm x 40cm

developmentJourney.title: Development Journey
developmentJourney.metroLine: Metro Line 1: Ben Thanh - Suoi Tien
developmentJourney.paragraph1: Ho Chi Minh City Metro construction began in 2012, with the desire to create a modern public transportation system, connecting key areas of the city.
developmentJourney.paragraph2: After more than a decade of development, we are proud to be an important part of Ho Chi Minh City's urban transportation system, providing citizens with safe, fast and convenient trips.
developmentJourney.paragraph3: With a commitment to continuous improvement and development, Metro HCM will continue to expand the network, applying advanced technology to better serve the transportation needs of city residents.
